Trade/Device Name(s): SD GlucoNavii® Mentor BT Blood Glucose Monitoring System
SD GlucoNavii® Mentor BT Multi Blood Glucose Monitoring System
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): SD GlucoNavii® Mentor BT Blood Glucose Meter
SD GlucoNavii® Mentor BT Multi Blood Glucose Meter
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for SD GlucoNavii Mentor BT Blood Glucose Monitoring System and Mentor BT Multi System with Bluetooth connectivity for quantitative measurement of glucose in fresh capillary whole blood
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for the quantitative measurement of glucose in fresh capillary whole blood from fingertip, forearm, upper arm, or palm; Mentor BT system is for single-patient home use, Mentor BT Multi is for multi-patient use in professional healthcare settings; not for diagnosis or screening of diabetes nor for neonates, and only for steady-state testing.
